name: C.A Robotics
description:
Welcome to C.A Robotics! The future of A.I We´re a trustworthy enterprise, and we´re developing the future!

Congratulations on winning a job in C.A Robotics, we welcome you with a  gunsh... Open Arms!  Since this will be your first day here, we will show you how things work:

  • Download and extract the corporation app below.
  • Then, you´ll have to keep an eye on possible errors on the A.I while it performs the tests;
  • Then, report anything that looks off to Ch  To the supervisor.

Run

And that´s it! A simple job, but a very important one, so whatever you do... Do not let ANYTHING pass, the supervisor would like to know everything...
